short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings the tranquility of nature to your browser with a stunning background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A serene river surrounded by lush green trees and a glowing sunset sky. The vibrant greenery, calm water, and peaceful atmosphere create a refreshing and relaxing environment for your browsing experience. This theme is perfect for those who love nature and want to feel connected to the outdoors even while online.
